name: ATIS Aviation Academy
about: ATIS Aviation Academy, established in 2010, is a pioneering institution in civil aviation training with a primary school in South Africa and an agent in Greece. Our academy has a proven track record of graduating pilots who are now employed by various companies worldwide. We pride ourselves on providing international-standard training conducted by both Arab and foreign instructors. Our commitment to excellence is matched by our dedication to creating a family-like climate for all students, ensuring any language barriers are addressed. With a focus on comprehensive training and student support, ATIS Aviation Academy strives to be the best in the world, helping aspiring pilots achieve their dreams.
services:
["International pilot program
Egyptian pilot program
Gulf pilot program
Pay as you go pilot program
Private Pilot License
Instructor Rating program
Type rating program
ATPL
ABC and Jet orientation Course
License Conversion
General English and Aviation English Program
Cabin Crew Course"]
